mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.name, u.phone, u.image, u.created_time as createdTime, i.sex, i.position, i.company, i.occupation, i.age, i.birthday, i.introduction, i.location, i.fans, i.follows, i.is_send_message as isSendMessage, i.is_recommend_friend as isRecommendFriend, i.is_recommend_me as isRecommendMe, i.is_display_image as isDisplayImage, i.updated_time as updatedTime from ap_user u LEFT JOIN ap_user_info i ON u.id = i.user_id WHERE u.id=#{userId}
